reviews.review:
三小时通关，就是流程短点。
我玩过最有创意的游戏之一。
结尾主题曲好评。
Absoluter Klassiker der in jede Steam Bibliothek gehört.
I really enjoyed this game but it seems like it had lots of bugs and i couldn't keep playing, does anyone know hot to fix this? :(

[h1] 老实说这个游戏给了我非常大的意外[/h1] 

，我原本以为这个游戏会和4399某些益智游戏一样，就是单纯的解谜通关这样的。[spoiler] 没想到在中途突然就黑化了，着实吓了我一跳。当我解完了所有的关卡之后突然发现迎来的是火坑，我就发现事情不简单，还好机智地逃走了。[/spoiler] 
由于是第一人称的原因，除了通过传送门可以看到自己的样子，别的方法都看不出来。然而剧情是不可能给你剧情的，这辈子都不可能给你的，只有通过旁白和你聊聊天，威胁威胁你这样子才能够满足。
虽然我真的很想剧透给你们，但是我想还是算了。还是自己简单思考思考。
没想到在这么早之前就能够做出这么用心的游戏。

[h1] 以下是剧透分析[/h1] 

[spoiler] 我原本是以为主角是一个志愿者或者是公司自己开发的仿生人应聘来进行测试传送门发射器（就是那个枪），但是因为全程并没有看到这个公司关于仿生人的相关制造机械或者是残缺肢体之类的，公司里所有的都是那种鸵鸟蛋一样的机器人。所以主角应该还是只是一个志愿者，有可能是被公司所绑架来的，用于测试机器人的流浪汉。这样一个流浪汉被抓来肯定是被洗脑了，但是控制的是我们玩家，所以产生了心智，一步一步完成逃脱的方式，最后出去，最后又不知道被什么东西拖走了。没错后面我懒得写了[/spoiler]

oyun çok iyi, oyunu ve bonus haritaları bitirdim oyun sona gittikçe güzelleşiyor ve heyecenlaşıyor yani ilk 5dk oynayıp bırakmayın bunu yapan çok kişi var
Not: oyunu paket şeklinde alabilirsiniz indirimlerde paket 3 lira oluyor ve yanında 4 oyun daha var.
This game is a gem. I love it.
Finally played this game after being in a coma! Anyways, Stan Loona
Jogo otimo de quebrar a cabeça de tanto pensar mas um pouco dificil na minha opinião
希望有生之年能玩到传送门3

Cuando a las IA se les va la olla y quieren obtener datos mediante pruebas jugando con pistolas de portales interdimensionales, sale Portal. 

Conoce a GLaDOS en este "First Person Portal Shooter", si se le puede llamar así.

Por si quedara alguno en el universo que no sepa qué juego es Portal, el resumen sería un juego en primera persona donde sólo tienes 1 arma: una pistola que hace un portal de entrada y otro de salida, que te sirve para resolver los puzzles que se te presentan en cada nivel.
Todo ello surgiendo desde el universo Half-Life.

Tiene años pero sigue estando bien si no has jugado.
Solo recuerda que THE CAKE IS A LIE
réellement bon jeu

Portal and Portal 2 are a blast. At this price, you can't go wrong. Pick them both up!

The cake is a lie, but the positive feedback this game has received is not. It's a rare breed of combined FPS/puzzle aspects which make it much more engaging than other puzzle games. I usually don't play puzzle games to completion, but I was hooked on the Portal series.

It's extremely innovative, challenging, rewarding, and not very stressful. I'd buy it again.

Now, Im partially blind to the Portal series, I know most of the storyline however, I never played the games... with that being said, off with the show!!

[h1]Story[/h1]
Portal is one of the most well-knowned for its story, gameplay and a couple of memes and it lives up to those things. At first I didn't care for the gameplay but more for the story. The story is what I believe a lot of people like  about Portal and I totally agree. The storyline is interesting and mysterious, [spoiler] where you are in a place where there are no humans and doing tasks for Glados and along the way there are messages about not trusting her. There is also the ending where you are dragged back to the testing center. [/spoiler] All of this leaves us with thinking up theories and some of the theories are so intriguing that it might as well be true. This is what I believe sold the game.

[h1]Gameplay[/h1]
Gameplay is pretty much using the two portals and makes you think of a way to past the tests. Also BLESS the option of saving the game with such ease, because it helps with...challenge mode....

[h1]Con[/h1]
Everyone here knows what Im gonna say... fuck the challenges. Honestly, that shit and the deveopers can go piss off. There are 3 challenges: Least time,portals, and steps. The only reasons why I hate this is becuase of the insanity of the developers thought players will do. You actually have to use glitches and using a computer, YES A COMPUTER to stop a door from closing. Doing it the normal way is impossible. Now is the differculty is hard? Sort of, it is mostly trial and error and you mist go find vids to see how. Bless the saving options, otherewise no one could even pass this.

Welp besides this, go buy the game now, recommended
UN EPICO JUEHO :V
This game was actually pretty good. Had a good story line and I went and got the second portal just based on how good this one was.

A really must have puzzle game! It is just awesome; the gameplay never seems boring, the ai and the small droids have such a cute voice <3 It has a nice little story round it and there are some easter eggs hidden in some levels which give you a little hint about the story progression. Awesome gem overall. 

10/10 Worth all the money you have!
I was surprised by this game. Although it simple, it's very challenging and fun. I strongly recommend it.
short but sweet

Me ha encantado, es un juego al que no le sobra ni falta nada. totalmente recomendable en vista de que suele estar a muy buen precio

Если брать по скидке, то вполне сносно.
Отличная идея и отличная реализация, но слишком короткий сюжет (1-2 ч).

Portal é um jogo de Puzzle e Aventura totalmente incrível.

Nesse jogo, criado pela maravilhosa Valve, a história é bem desenvolvida, parecendo apenas um jogo com uma arma de Portais no começo, mas no final revelando o plano de GLaDOS, a IA que acompanha você desde o começo do jogo.
A mecânica é muito bem feita, usando a gravidade como ponto crucial do jogo. Mesmo tendo sido inspirado em outro jogo, Portal é muito creativo, com coisas nunca vistas antes.

Nota: 10/10

Portal. um jogo da valve e do mesmo universo de half life. é um jogo de puzzle. como o nome já diz,vc usa portais nas fases. grafico bom, história legal, Jogabilidade boa. Eu recomendo para todos. 11/10

I recommended this game!

What a solid game! Not a very long gameplay Ill say, took me 2 hours to finish the game. First and all, the game is really great I highly recommend it! Every penny is worth it. If you are a person who likes puzzles and at the same time doing cool tricks, this game is for you. As for bugs, I have literally not encountered one which is really really great!

Puzzles are somehow confusing and hard and I had fun experimenting myself with the portal guns. Sometimes I solve a puzzle without me even knowing and Ill end up laughing about it.

Score: 10/10

As soon as I saw the trailer for Portal I knew it would be the game for me! Although the graphics are quite old, there still really good even now. The story plot wanted me to play it for even longer and the ending was just amazing! (No Spoilers!)

Even though this game is over 10 years old. I found it really fun and enjoyable. 
Great storyline and even better graphics for it being made in 2007.
10/10 would play again.
Very fun game. Takes a lot of thought to get past certain levels. Be sure to actually think when it comes to levels.
This game is great and I love how you get to do lab experiments. This game is fun and is worth your time.

Well, the game is quite enjoyable and fun though the campaign only lasted for 2-3 hours, while I remember that when I played the second portal game the campaign was longer. Another reason why I could spend more hours in Portal 2 is because it had coop which this game lacks. 
There are bonus levels and some extra levels for players that want to test out their speed. 

I recommend this game during sale for 0.81e for almost everyone that likes FPS Adventure Puzzle games but paying full price I would check another review.

Игра такая себе. Своих денег она не стоит. Проходится быстро,сюжет не очень. Когда ты играешь хочется уснуть,и не от того что это твой мозг устал думать,а из-за того что это нереально скучно. Головоломки лёгкие, но ты все равно в некоторых моментах будешь долго в них разбираться ибо ты не будешь понимать что от тебя требует игра



Игру не советую,заместо этого лучше купите Portal 2,она намного интересней,задачки сложнее,а сюжет и вовсе шекарен,+ вы сможете по играть со своим другом

Игра шыкарная 10 порталов из 10.
Но давайте росмотрим все плюсы и минусы 
Плюсы:
1.Класный сюжет 
2.Уникальный геймплей
3.Класные головоломки 
Минусы:
1.Быстро проходиться 
2.Некоторые сложные головоломки (это для меня но для вас может быть изи)
3.Голос Гладос (это для меня)
Muito bom, porém muito curto. 2 a 3 horas de campanha. Importante para compreender o segundo título da série. 8/10 pela duração.

Pro: Portal is a very fun puzzle game. I especially liked the ending of the game. Amazing value for only 1$. I recomend this game any time.
Con: A little on the short side. I would have liked more and harder to solve puzzles.
Great puzzles, great and funny storry and characters.

출근할 때 있으면 좋겠다..

遊戲原則簡單，就是在A點與B點建立空間通道，但是卻能以此延伸出各種變化
謎題有趣又有挑戰度，但並不算困難，只要發揮邏輯推理與想像力基本上就能通關
雖然有些許要找角度、抓準時機的操作要求，但並不誇張，沒有電競選手的反應與操作能力也能克服
劇情不複雜，好理解同時又能讓人融入其中，感受緊張感，主線背後也有許多細節可供挖掘、推敲，體現出故事的豐富度
腳色設計堪稱經典，在許多遊戲或影視作品都能看到致敬，當中的黑色幽默讓人會心一笑也塑造了腳色
如此經典遊戲，不玩可惜!!
Muy buen juego!
Simply a masterpiece.
Good game, but too short. Still recommended.

I don't know if I can recommend this game enough! The only downside to this game is that it is over too quickly. However the additional challenges definitely add to the re-playability of this game. 

If you haven't already - please go and try this game out. You wont be disappointed!

Great puzzle game with an amazing atmosphere, holds up in 2018. The villain of the game is very entertaining as well. Not much to say about this one, it plays good and is the best experience 81 cents can buy. Just don't go for the achievements because you'll be pulling your hair out

8/10 but it was probably a 10 when it released in 2007
velho como tem gente q n gosta disso?

Valve lo vuelve a hacer, juegazo tras juegazo, al igual que siempre mecanicas divertidisimas y no sobreexplotadas, juego dinamico y no repetitivo, [spoiler]es sorprendente y muy atractivo ver que la trama se entrecruza con Half-Life, aunque ene sta entrega todavia no sabemos como pero se nos muestra que todo ocurre en el mismo universo[/spoiler] En resumen es un [b]JUEGAZO[/b], bastante divertido pero es muy [b]CORTO[/b], recomendaria comprarlo solamente si esta en rebaja.

Loved the game. Solid gameplay all around and the game is really good with making the right atmoshphere. The graphics is OK I guess, but the game is quite old now so it doesnt matter too much. The only thing I didnt like is that it isa too short. You should probably grab it if it is up for sale.
esta buenisimo es mejor de lo que me esperaba me encanto vale la pena =D
Fantastico gioco, all'inizio un pò monotono ma molto ben strutturato e, anche se secondo me un pochetto semplice, per il resto bellisimo gioco

Es un juegazo, un clasico de entre los clasicos, los puzles y el humor del juego: Bienvenido a Aperture Science.
Su dinamica sorprendiera en su momento y a dia de hoy, con los años que pasaron aun sigue sorprendiendo, totalmente recomendable aun precio ridiculo, aunque tambien tiene sus añitos, nunca dejara de ser uno de los grandes clasicos de la industria.
